title: 3 Barrel Curling Iron Wand, slopehill Hair Waver Iron with LCD Temperature Display, 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Hair Crimper for Hair Styling (Purple)
features: Smooth & Shiny Waves: This styling waver features Triple Ceramic barrels to deliver instant and consistent heat, fast styling and long-lasting elegant looking curls. You can change up your look without any hassle.

Temp Adjustable: With the PTC technology, this 3 Barrel Hair Curling Wand goes from 0°C to 210°C (410°F) in 60 seconds. Easily adjust the temperature of the fast heating 3 Barrel Waver Iron Wand according to your hairstyles. Give you a fashion look in just a few minutes.

Works on All Hair Types: Whether you have short or long locks; thick or thin, this three barrel curling iron works like a charm. The heated ceramic produces negative ions during your usage, creates soft and shiny waves without any frizz. The Curling Iron can help you make your hair curling at home easy and safe.

Easy Operation: Our Hair Waver Curling Iron featured with an LCD display, which can clearly display temperature. The design of 360° rotatable and tangle-free cord, non-slip handle, and insulated barrel tips make your hair styling safer and easier. Worldwide voltage curling iron (110V-220V) is also great for international travel.

Perfect for All Occassions: Our 3 Barrel Hair Curling Wand creates beautiful beachy waves for dating, Valentine's Day, Birthday, Party, Wedding. 【After sell service】Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about this product, our Professional Customer Service Team provides 24*7 customer service.
